verses.verse: (A Song, a Psalm of Asaph.) O <S%H430>God,<s%> do not remain <S%H1824>quiet;<s%> Do not be <S%H2790>silent<s%> and, O <S%H410>God,<s%> do not be <S%H8252>still.<s%>
For, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> Thine <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H1993>make<s%> an <S%H1993>uproar;<s%> And those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> Thee have <S%H5375>exalted<s%> <S%H7218>themselves.<s%>
They <S%H6191>make<s%> <S%H6191>shrewd<s%> <S%H5475>plans<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> Thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> And <S%H3289>conspire<s%> together <S%H5921>against<s%> Thy <S%H6845>treasured<s%> ones.

They have <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1980>"Come,<s%> and let us <S%H3582>wipe<s%> them out as a <S%H1471>nation,<s%> That the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%>"
For they have <S%H3289>conspired<s%> <S%H9191>together<s%> with one <S%H3820>mind;<s%> <S%H5921>Against<s%> Thee do they <S%H3772>make<s%> a covenant: <S%H1285><s%>
The <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom<s%> and the <S%H3459>Ishmaelites;<s%> <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and the <S%H1905>Hagrites;<s%>

<S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> has <S%H3867>joined<s%> with them; They <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H2220>help<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H6213>Deal<s%> with them as with <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> As with <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> [and] <S%H2985>Jabin,<s%> at the <S%H5158>torrent<s%> of <S%H7028>Kishon,<s%>
Who were <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> at En-dor, Who <S%H1961>became<s%> as <S%H1828>dung<s%> for the <S%H127>ground.<s%>
<S%H7896>Make<s%> their <S%H5081>nobles<s%> like <S%H6159>Oreb<s%> and <S%H2062>Zeeb,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5257>princes<s%> like <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna,<s%>
O my <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H7896>make<s%> them like the <S%H1534>whirling<s%> <S%H1534>dust;<s%> Like <S%H7179>chaff<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7307>wind.<s%>
Like <S%H784>fire<s%> that <S%H1197>burns<s%> the <S%H9194>forest,<s%> And like a <S%H3852>flame<s%> that <S%H3857>sets<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> on <S%H3857>fire,<s%>
<S%H3651>So<s%> <S%H7291>pursue<s%> them with Thy <S%H5591>tempest,<s%> And <S%H926>terrify<s%> them with Thy <S%H5492>storm.<s%>
<S%H4390>Fill<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> with <S%H7036>dishonor,<s%> That they may <S%H1245>seek<s%> Thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
Let them be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H926>dismayed<s%> <S%H5703>forever;<s%> And let them be <S%H2659>humiliated<s%> and perish,

That they may <S%H3045>know<s%> that Thou <S%H905>alone,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Art the <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
